title: Fed Will Continue 'Doing What They've Been Doing' in Face of Turmoil, Says PGIM's Tipp
description: Robert Tipp, PGIM Managing Director, Chief Investment Strategist, and Head of Global Bonds, joins Bloomberg Businessweek Daily to discuss the bond market's reaction after Fed Chair Jerome Powell said the DOJ subpoenaed the central bank. Tipp also discusses Fed independence, why White House pressure on the Fed is different now versus during President Trump's first term, and says the Fed will "continue doing what it's been doing" in the face of ongoing political threats and leadership changes. Tipp speaks with Tim Stenovec and Christina Ruffini. (Source: Bloomberg)
